name: Blue Fish Goes Treasure Hunting
description:
This is my first attempt of making a game using the Godot Engine. Comments are appreciated.

In this game you are a fish, who wants to search for some treasure chests! Collect air bubbles to gather air supply - you can shoot enemy fish with bubble bullets. Avoid or destroy mines. You can also lure enemy fish to crash on them. Collect all treasure to finish the game.

Controls: arrow keys to move, space to shoot, escape to return to title screen.

Features:

Randomly generated layout each time! You can choose the map size from 3x3 to 20x20

Powerups: hearts will replenish your health, shields will grant you invulnerability for a short time, speed boost - self explanatory, zoom out - the camera zooms out, so you can have a broader view.

The game is still under development, so there may be (or rather surely are) bugs :) Doesn't work under Internet Explorer and older versions of Edge. Not tested on Safari.

Credits:

Underwater artwork by Luis Zuno @ansimuz
Fish artwork by https://www.gamedeveloperstudio.com
Heart powerup graphics by knik1985
Bubble graphics by Ouren
Music by Cleyton Kaufmann, Spring and isiah658

Assets downloaded from Opengameart.org
